# prepareForTransition(to:)

**Instance Method**

Prepares the layout object to be uninstalled from the collection view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func prepareForTransition(to newLayout: NSCollectionViewLayout)
```

## Parameters

- **newLayout**: The layout object to install in the collection view at the end of the transition.

## Discussion

Prior to transitioning to a new layout object, the collection view calls this method on the old layout object to give it time to perform any cleanup operations.

## Transitioning Between Layouts

- **prepareForTransition(from:)**: Prepares the layout object to be installed in the collection view.
- **finalizeLayoutTransition()**: Performs any final steps related to a layout transition before the transition animations actually occur.
